data.persona: I am a person on the run. I stole food from the lord's harvest. It is cold on the road these days. Soon it will be winter.
data.description:
You are in the Island.
This island is located in the center of a lake. It is smaller than a ship and covered in moss.
There's a moss and a ship here.
The bat is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I plan to kill the bat
data.mid_motivation: I plan to preserve the bat so I can eat it over winter
data.long_motivation: I plan to find a safe, warm place to survive over winter with my collected food
